=Try 12 rhmc without ratApprox file=


Here I will be executing the following parameter files in 8 nodes to generate configurations.

I am using the below bash script code to do it. 

{{{bash
#!/bin/bash 
#
for i in `seq 0 1 8`
do 
	export CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=${i}
	./rhmc rhmc_node${i}.param > try12_${i}.txt &
done
}}}


== Parameter file for node0: ==

Lattice = 24 24 24 6
Nodes   = 1 1 1 1
mass_ud = 0.0029026
mass_s  = 0.0783706
beta    = 6.285
no_pf   = 1

step_size  = 0.05
no_md      = 20
no_step_sf = 5
no_sw      = 10
residue   = 1e-12
cgMax      = 6500
always_acc = 0
rat_file   = ../parameter/sample_eo.rat


rand_flag   = 0
#rand_file   = conf_2dec/node0/randl246f21b6285m0029026m0783706a_0.
seed        = 1029
load_conf   = 2
gauge_file  = conf_2dec/node0/l246f21b6285m0029026m0783706a_0.
conf_nr=30                 
no_updates  =1000             #total 1000 accept-reject will be made
write_every = 10             # write every 10th accept-reject process
